author: @KNOE8
title: 'Grown with Love': senior citizen couple still running same potato farm after 40 years
text:
‘Grown with Love’: senior citizen couple still running same potato farm after 40 years
Published: Jan. 23, 2025 at 4:16 PM CST|Updated: 7 minutes ago
(InvestigateTV) — A couple in Vermont isn’t just married. They work as a team on their potato farm.
For decades, the Helebas have grown all types of spuds and then sold their harvest at local farmer’s markets.
Reporter Joe Carroll gets to the root of their partnership.
